replies.body: Gragas is getting his, too. Don't you worry.

Since I know you play/used to play GP aswell, do you think the nerfs on PBE will make him balanced/ get him out of his must-ban position?
I really just want to onetrick him :c

Yes. I think if you really want to 1 trick GP, these nerfs will be a good thing. His banrate is high and climbing. These are decent-sized nerfs but if you're an experienced GP player, you'll still be able to win a lot with him and him actually making it through the ban stage will be a boon.  

We tested out a lot of things but momentarily had settled on a set of ultimate changes. They made sense, but I was pretty confident that he'd still get the ban boot too much and gave that feedback.

Are there any idea for compensation buffs to Rek'Sai that would mostly help her solo queue play, but not her competitive play?
 I really enjoy playing Rek'Sai, but all these nerfs will almost completely take away her viability and make her a jungle farming machine.
26s CD on her tunnels at lvl1 would make it almost impossible to react with you tunnels without damaging your tunnel system through the jungle.

We don't have any immediate plans. We cut down on the scope of some of our projects because we didn't want to add any uncertainty.  

These 6.17 nerfs shouldn't destroy her viability. When I played her it made me more cautious of dropping tunnels in the jungle for mere convenience, but I had them up for ganks as usual.  With a little forethought, also was able to create a network around objectives when I wanted (even when behind).  

From previous patches (I wasn't point for the changes in 6.17), there was a push to increase her single-target threat and reduce her AoE utility.  That's a pretty tricky balancing act as she can already be threatening if she opts into a heavy damage build, it just tends not to be optimal.

I hope you realise these tunnel changes will make her e on a higher cooldown than a yasuo ult. Doesn't that sound a little ridiculous to you? I guess she's going in the "PRO PLAYERS ABUSE THIS CHAMP" trash can along with azir and Kallista. It seems unfair to all those Rek mains out there :P

If it doesn't pan out well, have you thought about making GP barrel's free armor pen scale similar to Darius's E or even have it actually scale with armor pen items so it's not so free in the beginning.

This whole One trick thing is highly overrated anyways.
